sentence.text: In primary forms treatment can lysosome localization the progression of both SRNS and encephalopathy, hence the critical importance of a prompt diagnosis.

Mutations in eight of them (PDSS1, ubiquinone biosynthetic process, COQ2, COQ4, COQ6, ADCK3, ADCK4, and ubiquinone biosynthetic process) cause primary CoQ(10) deficiency, a heterogeneous group of disorders with variable age of onset (from birth to the seventh decade) and associated clinical phenotypes, ranging from a fatal multisystem disease to isolated steroid resistant nephrotic syndrome (SRNS) or isolated central nervous system disease.
